verses.name: Joshua 11:8
verses.text: And the Lord delivered them into the hand of Israel, who smote them, and chased them unto great Zidon, and unto Misrephoth–maim, and unto the valley of Mizpeh eastward; and they smote them, until they left them none remaining.

verses.name: Joshua 11:9
verses.text: And Joshua did unto them as the Lord bade him: he houghed their horses, and burnt their chariots with fire.

verses.name: Joshua 11:10
verses.text: And Joshua at that time turned back, and took Hazor, and smote the king thereof with the sword: for Hazor beforetime was the head of all those kingdoms.
